0.text: Innate: Cassiopeia gains 4 − 72 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, but she cannot purchase Boots.
0.html: Innate: Cassiopeia gains 4 − 72 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, but she cannot purchase Boots.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Cassiopeia creates a blast at the target location that explodes after a 0.4-second delay. Enemies within the blast are  poisoned for 3 seconds, taking magic damage every second over the duration.
0.html: Active: Cassiopeia creates a blast at the target location that explodes after a 0.4-second delay. Enemies within the blast are poisoned for 3 seconds, taking magic damage every second over the duration.
markedPassages: poisoned

1.text: If Noxious Blast hits an enemy  champion, Cassiopeia gains  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
1.html: If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Cassiopeia spews forth 8 bolts of venom in an arc at the target location, creating toxic clouds at the area for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Cassiopeia spews forth 8 bolts of venom in an arc at the target location, creating toxic clouds at the area for 5 seconds.

1.text: Enemies within the clouds are  poisoned to take magic damage every second and become  grounded and  slowed by an amount that decays over the area's duration.
1.html: Enemies within the clouds are poisoned to take magic damage every second and become grounded and slowed by an amount that decays over the area's duration.
markedPassages: poisoned
grounded
slowed

2.text: Miasma will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Miasma will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Cassiopeia launches her fangs at the target enemy that deal 52 − 120 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) magic damage. If this kills the target, Twin Fang's  mana cost is refunded.
0.html: Active: Cassiopeia launches her fangs at the target enemy that deal 52 − 120 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) magic damage. If this kills the target, Twin Fang's  mana cost is refunded.
markedPassages: mana cost
mana cost

1.text: Against a  poisoned target, Twin Fang deals bonus magic damage and  heals Cassiopeia. The heal is reduced by 75% against  minions and small  monsters.
1.html: Against a poisoned target, Twin Fang deals bonus magic damage and heals Cassiopeia. The heal is reduced by 75% against minions and small monsters.
markedPassages: poisoned
heals
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Cassiopeia blasts enemies in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within and  slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds. Enemies with their facing direction towards her are instead  stunned for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Cassiopeia blasts enemies in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds. Enemies with their facing direction towards her are instead stunned for the same duration.
markedPassages: slowing
stunned

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+240 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if they are a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if they are a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
